sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user and tenant lifecycle: enable a new organization to register and the first Admin to log in and see their dashboard.
Enable core user workflows: Admins can invite users, invited users can register, and Subordinates can perform their primary function of checking in.
Complete the core attendance loop by implementing check-out, adding offline support, and enabling the Supervisor's primary approval workflow.
Deliver initial value for the Admin persona by building the first summary reports and enhancing the user offboarding security and workflow.
